select.foreach: select p.*, i.image_url, #{item.quantity} AS quantity from products p inner join product_images i on p.product_no = i.product_no where p.product_no = #{item.productNo} and i.image_type = 'M'

mapper.select: select m.member_id, m.member_name, m.phone_number, m.email, m.address, m.member_point, d.delivery_address, d.delivery_name, l.level_name, l.level_dc, l.level_point from members m inner join levels l on l.level_no = m.member_level left join delivery_addrs d on d.member_id = m.member_id and d.is_main = 'M' where m.member_id = #{memberId}
mapper.delete: delete from order_products where order_id in ( select order_id from orders o where o.orderer_id = #{ordererId} and ( o.payment_module_key is null or not exists (select 1 from payments p where o.order_id = p.order_id) ) )
delete from orders where orderer_Id = #{ordererId} and ( payment_module_key is null or not exists (select 1 from payments p where orders.order_id = p.order_id) )
mapper.select: select case when product_dc_type = 'P' then cast((product_price - (1 - dc_rate)) as signed) when product_dc_type = 'N' then product_price when product_dc_type is null then product_price end from products where product_no = #{productNo}
mapper.insert:
insert into order_products (order_id, product_no, product_dc_rate, product_dc_amount, order_count, product_price)
select #{orderId}, #{product.product_no}, case when product_dc_type = 'P' then dc_rate when product_dc_type = 'N' or product_dc_type is null then 0.0 end, case when product_dc_type = 'P' then cast((dc_rate * product_price) as signed) when product_dc_type = 'N' or product_dc_type is null then 0 end, #{product.order_count}, product_price from products where product_no = #{product.product_no}
mapper.select: select op.orderproduct_no, op.product_price as productPrice, op.order_count as orderCount, op.product_dc_rate as discountByItem, c.coupon_dc_amount as sumDiscountByCoupon, c.coupon_dc_rate as multipliedDiscountByCoupon, o.use_point as sumDiscountByPoint, case when #{isMember} then ( select level_point from levels l join members m on m.member_level = l.level_no where m.member_id = #{memberId} ) else 0.0 end as multipliedDiscountByMemberLevel from order_products op join orders o on o.order_id = op.order_id left join coupons c on c.coupon_no = o.coupon_no where op.order_id = #{orderId}
select order_id from orders where orderer_id = #{memberId} and payment_module_key is null
select total_price_expected from orders where order_id = #{orderId}
mapper.update: update orders set total_price_expected = (#{amount} + deliver_cost) where order_id = #{orderId}
update orders set payment_module_key = #{key} where order_id = #{orderId}
mapper.select: select payment_module_key from orders where order_id = #{orderId}
select coupon_no from orders where order_id = #{orderId}
select deliver_cost from orders where order_id = #{orderId}
mapper.insert: insert into coupon_used (member_id, coupon_code) values( (select orderer_id from orders where order_id = #{orderId}), (select coupon_code from coupon_paid where coupon_no = #{couponNo}) )
insert into point_used (member_id, use_point) values( (select orderer_id from orders where order_id = #{orderId}), (select use_point from orders where order_id = #{orderId}) )
mapper.update: update members set member_point = member_point - (select use_point from orders where order_id = #{orderId}) where member_id = (select orderer_id from orders where order_id = #{orderId})

update members m set m.member_point = m.member_point + ( (select total_price_expected from orders where order_id = #{orderId}) * (select level_point from levels where level_no = m.member_level) ) where m.member_id = (select orderer_id from orders where order_id = #{orderId})

update members m set m.member_level = ( select l.level_no from levels l where m.member_price >= l.level_min and m.member_price < l.level_max ) where m.member_id = (select orderer_id from orders where order_id = #{orderId})
mapper.insert: insert into payments (order_id, payment_status, payment_method, total_price, deposit_name, deposit_bank, deposit_account) values (#{orderId}, #{status}, #{moduleName}, #{amount}, #{depositName}, #{depositBank}, #{depositAccount});
mapper.select: select order_id from orders where orderer_id = #{memberId}

select ( case when c.cancel_apply_date is null then 'None' when c.cancel_apply_date is not null and c.cancel_complete_date is null and c.cancel_retract_date is null then '환불대기중' when c.cancel_apply_date is not null and c.cancel_retract_date is not null then '환불취소' when c.cancel_complete_date is not null then '환불완료' end ) as cancel_status, o.order_count as quantity, o.orderproduct_no, p.product_dc_type, p.dc_rate, p.product_price, p.product_no, p.product_name, pi.image_url from order_products o join products p on p.product_no = o.product_no join product_images pi on (pi.product_no = p.product_no and pi.image_type = 'M') left join cancels c on (c.order_id = #{orderId} and c.order_product_no = o.orderproduct_no) where o.order_id = #{orderId}
select order_id, order_date, order_status from orders where order_id = #{orderId}
